description.english: Complete the 1st playthrough, choose [New Game], inherit previous attributes and start a new game
description.schinese: 完成1周目后，选择「新的开始」继承属性并开启2周目
description.tchinese: 完成首輪遊戲後，選擇「全新開始」繼承屬性並開啟第二輪遊戲

description.english: Graduate from college and play till Week 5
description.schinese: 从大学毕业，游戏进行到第5周
description.tchinese: 大學畢業後，遊戲進行至第五週

description.schinese: 加入「慈善社」，成为社团成员
description.tchinese: 加入「慈愛社」，成為社團一員

displayName.english: Do Alien Cats Dream of Electronic Food?
displayName.schinese: 外星猫会梦到电子猫粮吗

description.schinese: 购买猫粮后试试「补觉」吧！
description.tchinese: 購買貓糧後試試「補眠」吧！

description.english: Fully equipped with both cooling and heating functions—my life depends on it!
description.schinese: 功能齐全冷暖两用，我的命都是它给的！
description.tchinese: 功能齊全冷暖兩用，我的命都是它給的！

description.english: After [Record Song] event, obtain [Firefly Audition—Summer Dream Story]
description.schinese: 完成「录歌」事件后，获得音乐专辑「萤火虫试唱-夏梦物语」
description.tchinese: 完成「錄歌」事件後，獲得音樂專輯「螢火蟲試唱－夏夢物語」

description.tchinese: 與咩咩的中之人第二代目見面

description.english: Pouring syrup into a spicy hot pot for a totally unique taste!
description.schinese: 「我认为麻辣烫必须加糖浆，不接受反驳」
description.tchinese: 「我認為麻辣燙必須加糖漿，不容反駁」

description.english: Watch Yumi's stream and find out the reason behind her stutter
description.schinese: 观看莜米直播，得知她结巴的原因
description.tchinese: 觀看莜米直播，得知她結巴的原因

displayName.english: The Disciple of the Great Sage

description.tchinese: 觀看芊穗直播，得知她的世界觀設定

description.schinese: 在逃大小姐还是黑棺的阴谋？
description.tchinese: 逃亡的千金還是黑棺的陰謀？
